snippet: The United States government is shipping emergency medical supplies to Brazil to treat survivors of a nightclub fire who are suffering from exposure to cyanide gas released in the blaze, officials said.
abstract: United States government is shipping emergency medical supplies to Brazil to treat survivors of nightclub fire who are suffering from exposure to cyanide gas released in blaze.
lead_paragraph: The United States government is shipping emergency medical supplies to Brazil to treat survivors of a nightclub fire who are suffering from exposure to cyanide gas released in the blaze, officials said.

headline.main: U.S. Offers Medical Aid for Victims of Club Fire in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Brazil: U.S. Offers Medical Aid for Victims of Club Fire
